original_title: Le long cri du train qui passe se glisse au coeur des spectres et tout explose en silence
overview: An experimental animated film built around a single sound recording that evokes travel, the need to communicate, solitude, fragility, the desire for freedom, the arrival of fall, and our ephemeral existence.
title: The Long Wail of a Passing Train Slips into the Heart of the Ghosts and Everything Explodes into Silence
